channel.title: 金融时报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪金融时报news的种子

item.title: 爆炸性新闻：迈克尔-戈夫（Michael Gove）决定阻止玛莎百货重建其位于伦敦牛津街的旗舰店，玛莎百货在高等法院对该决定提出的法律挑战中获胜。
item.description:
Breaking news: Marks and Spencer has won a legal challenge in the High Court against Michael Gove’s decision to stop the retailer from rebuilding its flagship store on London’s Oxford Street https://t.co/xFfYBxlX9B pic.twitter.com/yRT5m0XNcK

— Financial Times (@FT) March 1, 2024

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）正在起诉 OpenAI 及其首席执行官山姆-阿尔特曼（Sam Altman），指控这家聊天工具制造商与微软公司（Microsoft）的数十亿美元联盟损害了这家初创公司为人类造福而构建人工智能系统的初衷。
item.description:
Elon Musk is suing OpenAI and its chief executive Sam Altman, alleging the ChatGPT-maker’s multibillion-dollar alliance with Microsoft has compromised the start-up’s original mission of building artificial intelligence systems for the benefit of humanity https://t.co/b8NWQXvsxI pic.twitter.com/JpnxtaBlZI

— Financial Times (@FT) March 1, 2024

item.title: 独家新闻：Zara 正准备重新开放其在乌克兰的门店，这些门店在战争爆发时被关闭，这是一个具有里程碑意义的时刻，凸显出尽管与俄罗斯发生冲突，但一些城市的生活仍在脆弱地恢复正常。 via @FT @barneyjopson
item.description:
Scoop: Zara is preparing to reopen the stores in Ukraine that it slammed shut when war broke out, a landmark moment underscoring the fragile new normality of life in several cities despite the conflict with Russia. via @FT ⁦@barneyjopson⁩ https://t.co/KTPRf4UJCL

— Anne-Sylvaine Chassany (@ChassNews) March 1, 2024

item.title: 据 @OilSheppard 报道，为普京的旗舰能源计划提供支持的无耻北极之旅的内幕：一位出生于美国的前好莱坞金融家和曾经的英国奥林匹克组织成员正在北极冰层和制裁中航行，以帮助俄罗斯保持液化天然气的希望。
item.description:
Inside a brazen Arctic trip supplying Putin’s flagship energy scheme: a US-born former Hollywood financier and onetime member of the UK Olympic setup is navigating Arctic ice and sanctions to help keep Russia’s LNG hopes alive, ⁦@OilSheppard⁩ reports https://t.co/VY7sU3vNSi

— max seddon (@maxseddon) March 1, 2024
